arStrings.szText:
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance for your Skills to inflict {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse{/u}{/c} on enemies. Enemies afflicted with {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse{/u}{/c} are also {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.

{icon:bullet} {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse's{/u}{/c} stored souls deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|1%|]{/c} increased damage.
